resources.string:
What\'s new:

1.2.0 - New directory navigation, visible scrollbar (see settings), gl16 mode (eInk refresh mode) may be set now via settings
1.1.3 - Check HW and warn if it isn\'t NookSimpleTouch
1.1.2 - Associations settings allows now to configure explicit applications invocation as well as general intent creation. Obsolete \'how to call readers\' setting removed.
1.1.1 - New Cancel/Revert buttons in settings screen.
1.1.0 - Task manager / battery manager - just tap on memory or battery status (bottom of the main screen, launcher mode only)

The tool is for Nook Simple Touch only!


Continue anyway ?
